title: One Of The Fastest Growing IT Staffing Agencies In The U.S.
testimonial_header: What Our Employees Say About Equitas IT INC?

employee_testimonials.title: Deeksha
employee_testimonials.description: I feel very proud to be a part of Equitas IT INC. I’ve started my career in this company and have gained extraordinary knowledge. I’m very grateful to work in such a place where employees are valued & given new opportunities.

employee_testimonials.title: Vaishnav
employee_testimonials.description: Good company with great work culture. I’m thankful to the management for letting me grow in my profession. Equitas INC is the best choice for long-term career.

why_equitas.title: Why choose Equitas IT INC
why_equitas.description: We are the one-stop solution for providing quality talent to meet our clients’ IT staffing needs. If you are a job aspirant than you can kick start your IT career with us. Or if you wish to join a passionate team of staffing professionals, we make your dreams come true.

business_practices.title: Business Practices
business_practices.description: We provide Recruitment and Staffing services to many industries through our innovative & customized solutions. Ability to comprehend the hiring strategies, talent availability and compensation benchmarking are what makes us a proud hiring partner for different industries.
